metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28831 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
decompress_gunzip.c in BusyBox through 1.32.1 mishandles the error bit on the huft_build result pointer, with a resultant invalid free or segmentation fault, via malformed gzip data.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-28831` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
busybox-static - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
udhcpc - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
udhcpd - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1').
